1567646630_1BBxotsHK1A6e7uRD6N29qVSMMCSm.body:
ED hasn't been taken down apparently.  Regardless, despite the irony noted by others I know what you mean - (((they))) want to shut down debate on public platforms.  They're terrified of the truth, about anything, in the public domain.  There's very little we can do, other than support free speech platforms, technologies and organisations though - nobody seems to have the appetite to riot, the masses have been subdued with consumer comfort.

At this point, if you want to host anything other than approved-by-the-state content you need to plan carefully.  After all these years TPB is still alive, so it's not like Cloudflare and Swedish registrars are out of the question for some things; best to stay out of the EU and 5 eyes though - Switzerland/Liechtenstein for domains, Moldova or Serbia for IP connectivity for example.

Or Iran if you want to host anti-US content! :P
